授業目的: The Intensive English Summer School in “Communicating with Confidence and Impact” is a learner-centered, confidence building, interactive course focusing on the practicalities of public speaking, interview techniques and communication skills. Drawing on drama techniques, students are trained in how to use their voices effectively and how to use posture and body language to build personal presence and communicate with confidence and impact.
到達目標: This is an intensive English training course designed to go beyond the confines of the weekly classes held throughout the semester for students. As such students are expected to immerse themselves fully within the total English environment that will be created throughout the duration of the Summer School.
特記事項: 【合併】特別英語セミナー（理学部）/千刈集中英語実習（理工学部）/特別英語セミナー（理工学部）/特別英語セミナー（工学部）/特別英語セミナー（生命環境学部）
授業方法: This is a fun course which utilizes physical activities and breathing techniques which will transform each student into a powerful public speaker who will have acquired the skills to communicate with confidence and impact in any situation and in any language and culture.
